body_html: Yeah, for now we don't recurse into lists/dictionary members of a tf.keras.Model, so you'll have to explicitly assign member variables. Figuring out the right public API is on our TODO list
body_text: Yeah, for now we don't recurse into lists/dictionary members of a tf.keras.Model, so you'll have to explicitly assign member variables. Figuring out the right public API is on our TODO list
body: Yeah, for now we [don't recurse into lists/dictionary members of a `tf.keras.Model`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/f8b74d642420dcf2f5cab763b41884a05777ea45/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/engine/network.py#L344), so you'll have to explicitly assign member variables. Figuring out the right public API is on our [TODO list](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/f27033fb1212d7031a359c913d0f59e976b14c14/tensorflow/contrib/eager/python/examples/rnn_ptb/rnn_ptb.py#L77)
